sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, rownum as rnum, floor((rownum-1)/5+1) as page, count(*) over() as totcnt FROM (SELECT no, name, title, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as reg_date, member_no, read_no FROM board ORDER BY reg_date DESC) A ) WHERE page = #page#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, rownum as rnum, floor((rownum-1)/5+1) as page, count(*) over() as totcnt FROM (SELECT no, name, title, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as reg_date, member_no, read_no FROM board ORDER BY reg_date DESC) A ) WHERE name like '%' || #kwd# || '%' or title like '%' || #kwd# || '%'
SELECT no, name, title, content, reg_date, member_no, read_no, group_no, order_no, depth_no from board WHERE no=#no#
sqlMap.insert: insert into board values (board_seq.nextval, #name#, #title#, #content#, sysdate, #memberNo#, 0, (select nvl(max(group_no)+1, 0) from board), 0, 0)
sqlMap.update: update board set title=#title#, content=#content#, reg_date=sysdate where no=#no#
update board set read_no=read_no+1 where no=#no#
update board set order_no=order_no+1 where groupno=#groupNo# and order_no>=#orderNo#
